Title: Relates to establishing a mileage-based exit numbering system
Summary: Authorizes and directs the commissioner of transportation and the New York state thruway authority to implement a mileage-based exit numbering system along interstate highways located within the state.
LawCode: Add ยง332, Hway L; add ยง389, Pub Auth L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the highway law and the public authorities law, in relation to establishing a mileage-based numbering system for exits along interstate highways within the state
